title: Sr Systems Engineer
content:
In order to join the ELEVI Team you will need
A CURRENT  SECURITY CLEARANCE WITH FS IS REQUIRED.  
A Bachelorâ€™s degree in a Qualified Engineering Field is great  
Fifteen (15) + years of systems engineering experience
Required Skills:â€¢ Strong experience developing and maintaining Niagara Files Solutionsâ€¢ Familiar with the customerâ€™s dataflow architectureâ€¢ Linux/Red Hat experienceâ€¢ Understanding of monitoring infrastructure health and dataflowsâ€¢ Understands value delivery using Agile methodologies of project managementâ€¢ Understands Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe)â€¢ Experience with Atlassian products (Confluence, Jira) to support workflow managementâ€¢ Able to lead discussions, field questions and articulate solutions based on best practices and sound technical acumenâ€¢ Strong and effective communication and collaboration skillsâ€¢ Comfortable with speaking and presenting to senior leadership
Weâ€™re an equal opportunity employer (EOE) that empowers our people. It is the policy of ELEVI to provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and employment applicantsâ€”without regard to unlawful considerations of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, sensory, physical or mental disability, marital status, veteran or military status, genetic information, or any other classification protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws. We fearlessly drive change, because without diversity of thought and a commitment to equality for all, there is no moving forward. Reasonable accommodations are available for qualified individuals with disabilities, upon request. This policy applies to all aspects of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, discipline, and termination.

questions.label: Do you possess the required current or active security clearance with poly?
